reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: 1. Project: 11753 FCA Cambodia Country Office (CAMCO) 2. Project area and Country: Cambodia 3. Project justification: FCA Cambodia country programme (CP) will continue to focus on access to inclusive quality education; the right to develop, secure and sus tain livelihoods through employment, entrepreneurship and strengthened resilience; and the participation of the local communities, including the youth, in different structures to raise their voices and play an active role in their own development. FCA’s field presence is essential for increased impact and enhanced programme quality. It is in line with FCA’s strategy and supports FCA’s strategic goals related to programme development and quality, capacity building, advocacy, thematic/technical support, monitoring and diversification of the funding base. 4. The main objective and expected results: The objective is to improve effectiveness, quality and impact of FCA’s Cambodia country programme through established field presence. The expected results a re: • Strategic and operational planning including programme and project PME and administrative support • Established a functional working relationship and collaboration with UN agencies, I/NGOs, CBOs and government authorities at country level • New partnership and networking opportunities have been created to broadening the funding opportunities • Effective coordination of work and cooperation with other aid organisations • Capacity of local partners are built for effective and efficient pr ogramme implementation • Thematic advice is provided to the country programme and projects • Effective emergency response/humanitarian aid has been provided during disasters • Resourcing and staffing of the Country Office have been ensured • Man agement and administration of the Country Office have been further strengthened • Input of partner organisations and topics from the country into the lobby and advocacy work have been increased • Support and input for communication purposes have been ensured 5. Right-holders/ beneficiaries: The staff and partners of CAMCO Country Office 6. Implementing partner: FCA Cambodia Country Office 7. Budget 2018: Total budget EUR 364,500
